tools.name: Multi-Layer Perceptron Classifier
tools.description: Neural network-based classifier for complex pattern recognition in medical data
tools.output_format: Classification probability + Confidence score + Feature importance

tools.name: XGBoost Classifier
tools.description: Gradient boosting framework for high-performance classification with feature importance analysis
tools.output_format: Classification result + Probability distribution + Feature importance ranking

tools.name: LightGBM Classifier
tools.description: Light gradient boosting machine for fast and accurate classification with low memory usage
tools.output_format: Classification result + Probability distribution + Feature importance ranking

tools.name: Random Forest Classifier
tools.description: Ensemble learning method using multiple decision trees for robust classification
tools.output_format: Classification result + Probability distribution + Feature importance ranking

tools.name: Logistic Regression
tools.description: Linear classification model for interpretable binary and multiclass classification
tools.output_format: Classification result + Probability distribution + Coefficient analysis
